issue.title: [bug] Product name must match Cargo.toml otherwise fails to deploy on iOS

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

repository.name: tauri
repository.description: Build smaller, faster, and more secure desktop and mobile applications with a web frontend.

issue.body:
### Describe the bug

The `productName` must match `[Package].name` in Cargo.toml otherwise the application will fail to deploy on iOS.
Note: Happens regardless of whether `mainBinaryName` is provided.

```
lstat of /Users/matthew/Projects/foo-application/src-tauri/gen/apple/build/foo-application_iOS.xcarchive/Products/Applications/Foo Application.app failed: No such file or directory
Unhandled error domain NSPOSIXErrorDomain, code 2
Failed to deploy app to simulator: command ["xcrun", "simctl", "install", "157F3459-0C25-4604-BEB4-507EDB3553D0"] exited with code 2
```

### Reproduction

Create a new Tauri 2.x application.
Use the following **tauri.conf.json** and **Cargo.toml** configuration:

**tauri.conf.json**
```
"productName": "Foo Application",
"mainBinaryName": "foo-application"
```

**Cargo.toml**
```
"[package].name": "foo-application"
```

Attempt to build and deploy to an iOS simulator.

### Expected behavior

The application should build/deploy successfully.

body: the product name defaults to Cargo.toml's `[package].name` when `tauri.conf.json > productName` is not set. I'll add a warning in this case.

Thanks, @lucasfernog. I fixed this manually by updating `@string/app_name` to the correct value and removing the separate `@string/main_activity_title` from the main activity in AndroidManifest.xml.

Unlike iOS, these values on Android arenâ€™t automatically updated when `productName` is changed in tauri.conf.json. On iOS, changing `productName` automatically updates the PRODUCT_NAME variable in project.pbxproj.

To achieve parity with this behavior does a further change need to be made to the toolchain?
@velocitysystems where did you change these values?

> Thanks, [@lucasfernog](https://github.com/lucasfernog). I fixed this manually by updating `@string/app_name` to the correct value and removing the separate `@string/main_activity_title` from the main activity in AndroidManifest.xml.
> 
> Unlike iOS, these values on Android arenâ€™t automatically updated when `productName` is changed in tauri.conf.json. On iOS, changing `productName` automatically updates the PRODUCT_NAME variable in project.pbxproj.
> 
> To achieve parity with this behavior does a further change need to be made to the toolchain?

yes we would need to implement that

@lucasfernog Just noting these values _are_ updated when deleting/reinitializing the platform projects using `npx tauri [platform] init.` The issue is this _only_ happens when creating from the `init` templates.
